title: Safety of Life at Sea
summary: Minimum safety standards for construction, equipment and operation.
content: SOLAS covers Chap V (Navigation), Chap IX (ISM Code), Chap XI-2 (ISPS Code).

title: Prevention of Pollution
summary: Preventing pollution by oil, sewage, garbage and air emissions.
content: Annex I (Oil), Annex IV (Sewage), Annex V (Garbage), Annex VI (Air Pollution/Sulphur Cap 0.5%).

title: Training Standards
summary: Qualification standards for masters, officers and watch personnel.
content: Mandates rest hours: Min 10 hours in 24h period; 77 hours in 7-day period.

title: Maritime Labour Convention
content: Covers employment agreements, wages, hours of work/rest, and medical care.
